<h1 align="center">Ball Simulation</h1>
<h2 align="center">Simple Ball Simulation made using JavaFX (unfinished)</h2>
<img src="images/banner.png">

### Designed to exhibit proficiency in both physics and JavaFX, this project aims to showcase a seamless amalgamation of physics principles within an interactive JavaFX environment 

### You Can view real-time data
<img src="images/img.png">


## Physics Principles
### - Gravity
### - Kinetic Energy
### - Potential Energy
